statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 8 \\ -10 \\ 12 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 13 \\ -17 \\ 31 \\ -40 \\ -44 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
